data.title: Re-establishment of: Santa Rosa School District changed to Bennett Valley, 1942
data.text:
Per the most recent retention schedule (adopted 2008 December 9), this file classed as part of the series: School district files (BDSU-0530). Records in this series are described as: Board of Supervisors records pertaining to country school districts (1855-present). Includes: tax anticipation notes, etc.

Materials stored offsite, but collection is open to research. To view these materials, please call Sonoma County History and Genealogy Library staff at 707 308-3212 to request they be brought from the Archives to the Library.
